title: Yes, You Can Shop Sweaters from Your Favorite Brands on Amazon Right Now
description: The best styles are right at your fingertips.
excerpt: There's no need to shop around for your fall wardrobe—not when Amazon has all of your favorite brands in one place! Shop the 25 best sweaters on Amazon now.

html:
Fair Isle Fall

Saylor Daria Cardigan

What’s cold-weather style without a touch of Fair Isle? We’re loving this chic cardigan interpretation from Saylor!

Colors: Multi

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 58% acrylic, 30% polyester, 10% wool, 2% elastane

A hint of fringe

By Malene Birger Dreele Sweater

A fitted knit with fringe trim makes for the perfect layering piece or a standout choice on its own.

Colors: Oyster Gray

Sizes: 2XS-XL

Material: 60% wool, 40% mohair

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

With a twist

IRO Ferisse Sweater

Take your sweater style to the next level with a bold, plunging V-neck and a statement drop-shoulder design.

Colors: Brown Camel

Sizes: 2XS-XL

Material: 39% polyamide, 37% alpaca, 24% wool

Modern Chevron

Figue Shahna Sweater

Chevron is a timeless pattern that is constantly reimagined in fresh styles. This alpine green and cream combo creates the perfect autumn neutral.

Colors: Chevron Alpine Green

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: 69% wool, 18% polyester, 11% nylon, 2% alpaca

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Boyfriend Cardigan

Free People Blossom Cardi

What’s cozier than a slouchy cardigan? This one is so comfortable, you’ll never want to take it off.

Colors: Ivy Earthy Combo, Big Dipper, Ivory Pastel

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: 100% Cotton

Stripe Season

De Loreta Oma Sweater

When it comes to stripes, don’t be afraid to embrace vibrant new colors.

Colors: Peacock

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 55.5% alpaca, 16.5% merino wool, 13.5% baby alpaca, 6% silk, 5.5% mohair, 3% recycled polyamide

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bejeweled

Endless Rose Fuzzy Jewel Sweater Top

Perfect for both the office and a night out, this fuzzy sweater top effortlessly blends glam and comfort in the most stylish way.

Colors: Black

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 100% Nylon

Cozy Pullover

IRO Lison Pullover

Whether we like it or not, colder days are on the horizon. This chunky pullover is a must-have for the first frost.

Colors: Black/Ecru

Sizes: 2XS-XL

Material: 46% wool, 33% acrylic, 11% polyamide, 9% cotton, 1% elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Mad about plaid

R13 Mohair Boyfriend Cardigan

Plaid is a quintessential fall staple, and this distressed R13 cardigan offers the perfect combo of preppy style and edgy flair.

Colors: Multi Mohair Plaid

Sizes: S-L

Material: 40% nylon, 32% mohair, 28% merino wool

Snug in style

AREA Twisted Knit Turtleneck Sweater

Sweaters are usually for the cold, but this one definitely brings the heat.

Colors: Midnight Blue, Light Beige

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: 46% Acrylic, 28% Wool Mohair, 19% Polyamide, 7% Polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Trend Alert

Rails Harris Sweater

All your favorite style icons are embracing the rugby shirt trend, and this knit version from Rails is exactly what you need to join in.

Colors: Rugby Stripe

Sizes: XS-M

Material: 50% cotton, 35% wool, 15% cashmere

A little bit of lace

LoveShackFancy Louella Cardigan

Ladies, how about a little lace this season? This LoveShackFancy cable-knit cardigan, interwoven with delicate lace ribbon, will add a touch of romance to your ensemble.

Colors: Silver Mist

Sizes: 2XS-2XL

Material: 70% alpaca, 23% nylon, 7% wool

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Cropped Cardi

Lioness Head in The Clouds Cardigan

Whether paired with pleated trousers, your favorite fall skirt, or baggy jeans, this affordable cardigan from Lioness will become a wardrobe staple.

Colors: Ivory

Sizes: S-3XL

Material: 49% viscose, 28% polyester, 23% nylon

Boho Duster

Line & Dot Altura Long Cardigan

Embracing boho style has never been more comfortable. Snuggle up in this distressed duster or cinch it with a leather belt to wear it as a chic wrap dress!

Colors: Toffee

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 89% polyester, 6% spandex, 5% wool

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A little chill

Naadam Luxe Cashmere Collared Asymmetrical Sweater

Is this what they mean by giving someone the “cold shoulder”?

Colors: Cement

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 100% Cashmere

Fall Staple

Madewell Snowy Lace Cole Cardigan

If you don’t have a black cardigan yet, it’s not too late to get one for your closet. This pointelle knit style from Madewell adds texture and interest to a wardrobe essential.

Colors: Abysse Black

Sizes: XL-2XL

Material: 72% viscose, 28% polyester

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Après chic

Perfect Moment Chevron Balloon Sleeve Sweater

Whether you’re hitting the slopes or simply there for the cozy vibes, this chevron turtleneck will have you serving all the snowed-in style.

Colors: Snow White/Black

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: 100% Merino Wool

Speckled prep

Self Portrait Navy Metallic Merino Cardigan

A touch of metallic yarn and shiny gold buttons will pair beautifully with your favorite fall jewelry trend.

Colors: Navy

Sizes: XS-L

Material: 73% wool, 13% polyamide, 11% polyester, 3% metallic

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Minimalism at its finest

Rag & Bone Lori Cardigan

If Lily van der Woodsen is the muse of your fall fashion moodboard, this Rag & Bone cardigan is the perfect place to start.

Colors: Oatmeal

Sizes: S-XL

Material: 79% wool, 19% nylon, 2% spandex

Statement Collar

Staud Christopher Sweater

Playing with scale can truly transform your style game. I’m obsessed with the dramatic oversized collar on this fitted Staud sweater.

Colors: Black Melange

Sizes: XS-XL

Material: 50% nylon, 50% wool
